sentences.en: All sense - perception can occur only through the medium of some bodily substance.
sentences.cn: 所有的感观知觉都只能通过某种身体物质的媒介才能发生.

sentences.en: And when they do, what do you think their perception will be?
sentences.cn: 当他们这样做时，你觉得他们的知觉是怎样的？

sentences.en: He believes many "psychics" are frauds who rely on perception and subtle deception.
sentences.cn: 他认为许多“通灵者”都是骗子，他们都是靠直觉和巧妙的骗术蒙人。

sentences.en: He is interested in how our perceptions of death affect the way we live.
sentences.cn: 他对我们的死亡观如何影响我们的生活方式感兴趣。

sentences.en: Her remarks were curiously lacking in perception.
sentences.cn: 她的评论缺乏洞察力,这真让人费解.

sentences.en: Human perception is highly imperfect and by definition subjective.
sentences.cn: 人的感知具有高度缺陷，而且天性主观。

sentences.en: It did not require a great deal of perception to realise the interview was over.
sentences.cn: 并不需要多少洞察力也能意识到面试已经结束了。

sentences.en: It did not require a lot of perception to realize the interview was over.
sentences.cn: 不需要很强的洞察力就可以意识到面试结束了。

sentences.en: She showed great perception in her assessment of the family situation.
sentences.cn: 她对家庭状况的分析显示出敏锐的洞察力。

sentences.en: Television has irreversibly changed our perception of the Royal Family.
sentences.cn: 电视不可逆转地改变了我们对皇室的印象。

sentences.en: The arena of modern science lies beyond direct perception.
sentences.cn: 现代科学的范围超出人的直接感知.

sentences.en: The perception of pain is still complex and remains difficult to define.
sentences.cn: 疼痛的感知至今仍认为很复杂,难以解释.

sentences.en: The President wants to squelch any perception that the meeting is an attempt to negotiate.
sentences.cn: 总统想要消除任何视本次会议为谈判尝试的看法。

sentences.en: They may attain considerable accuracy in the perception of flat form.
sentences.cn: 他们对平面形体的视觉能达到很精确的程度.

sentences.en: Under what conditions is your perception of temperature fairly accurate?
sentences.cn: 在什么条件下,人的温度感觉是准确的?

sentences.en: What's your perception of the matter?
You must acquire great finesse of perception.
sentences.cn: 你必须学会洞察事物的高超技巧.
